parameters.query:
SELECT
  area,
  ROUND(SUM(reading)::numeric, 2)                          AS total_kwh,
  ROUND(AVG(reading)::numeric, 2)                          AS promedio_kwh,
  ROUND(MAX(reading)::numeric, 2)                          AS pico_kwh,
  ROUND(MIN(reading)::numeric, 2)                          AS minimo_kwh,
  COUNT(*)                                                  AS lecturas,
  MAX(severity)                                             AS estado_max
FROM energy_history
WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
GROUP BY area
ORDER BY total_kwh DESC;

parameters.name: reply_markup
parameters.value: ={{ JSON.stringify({ inline_keyboard: [[{text:'‚¨ÖÔ∏è Volver al Men√∫', callback_data:'/start'}, {text:'üîÑ Actualizar', callback_data:'get_report'}]] }) }}

parameters.query:
SELECT
  e.area,
  e.reading                                          AS actual,
  e.ema                                              AS promedio,
  e.severity                                         AS estado,
  ROUND(((e.reading - e.ema) / NULLIF(e.ema,0) * 100)::numeric, 1) AS desviacion_pct,
  to_char(e.timestamp, 'HH24:MI:SS')                 AS hora,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM anomalias a
   WHERE a.area = e.area
     AND a.timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour')   AS alertas_1h
FROM energy_history e
WHERE (e.area, e.timestamp) IN (
    SELECT area, MAX(timestamp)
    FROM energy_history GROUP BY area
)
ORDER BY ABS((e.reading - e.ema) / NULLIF(e.ema,0)) DESC;

parameters.name: reply_markup
parameters.value: ={{ JSON.stringify({ inline_keyboard: [[{text:'üîÑ Actualizar', callback_data:'get_status'}, {text:'‚¨ÖÔ∏è Men√∫', callback_data:'/start'}]] }) }}

parameters.query:
SELECT
  a.id,
  a.area,
  a.severidad,
  ROUND(a.valor_kwh::numeric, 2)      AS valor_kwh,
  ROUND(a.ema_kwh::numeric, 2)        AS ema_kwh,
  ROUND(a.desviacion::numeric, 1)     AS desviacion,
  a.recomendacion,
  to_char(a.timestamp, 'DD/MM HH24:MI') AS cuando
FROM anomalias a
WHERE a.timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '6 hours'
ORDER BY a.timestamp DESC
LIMIT 10;

parameters.name: reply_markup
parameters.value: ={{ JSON.stringify({ inline_keyboard: [[{text:'üîÑ Actualizar', callback_data:'get_anomalias'}, {text:'‚¨ÖÔ∏è Men√∫', callback_data:'/start'}]] }) }}

parameters.query:
SELECT
  area,
  ROUND(AVG(reading)::numeric, 2)  AS promedio_kwh,
  ROUND(STDDEV(reading)::numeric, 2) AS desviacion_std,
  ROUND(MAX(reading)::numeric, 2)  AS pico_historico,
  COUNT(*)                          AS total_lecturas,
  to_char(MAX(timestamp),'DD/MM HH24:MI') AS ultima_lectura
FROM energy_history
WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'
GROUP BY area
ORDER BY promedio_kwh DESC;

messageValues.message: Act√∫a como motor de predicci√≥n JSON. Solo responde el objeto JSON, sin texto adicional.

parameters.query:
SELECT
  area,
  ROUND(reading::numeric,4)           AS kwh,
  ROUND(ema::numeric,4)               AS ema,
  severity                             AS estado,
  to_char(timestamp,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS timestamp
FROM energy_history
WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
ORDER BY area, timestamp ASC;

parameters.name: caption
parameters.value: =üìÅ Exportaci√≥n Energ√©tica ‚Äî √öltimas 24h\nüìä {{ $json.total_rows }} registros exportados\nü§ñ Sistema de Monitoreo v2

parameters.query:
SELECT
  area,
  ROUND(reading::numeric,2) AS kwh,
  ROUND(ema::numeric,2)     AS ema,
  severity
FROM energy_history
WHERE (area, timestamp) IN (
  SELECT area, MAX(timestamp) FROM energy_history GROUP BY area
);

SELECT
  COALESCE(e.ema_actual, {{ $json.kwh }}) AS ema_actual,
  COALESCE(e.contador, 0)                 AS contador
FROM (SELECT 1) AS dummy
LEFT JOIN ema_estado e ON e.area = '{{ $json.area }}';

INSERT INTO ema_estado (area, ema_actual, contador, ultima_vez)
VALUES ('{{ $json.area }}', {{ $json.ema }}, {{ $json.lectura_num }}, NOW())
ON CONFLICT (area)
DO UPDATE SET
  ema_actual = CASE WHEN '{{ $json.modo }}' IN ('normal', 'ok') THEN EXCLUDED.ema_actual ELSE ema_estado.ema_actual END,
  contador = CASE WHEN '{{ $json.modo }}' IN ('normal', 'ok') THEN EXCLUDED.contador ELSE ema_estado.contador END,
  ultima_vez = NOW();

parameters.body: =consumo_energetico,area={{ $('Calcular EMA').item.json.area }} kwh={{ $('Calcular EMA').item.json.kwh }},ema={{ $('Calcular EMA').item.json.ema }},desviacion={{ $('Calcular EMA').item.json.desviacion }},severidad="{{ $('Calcular EMA').item.json.severidad }}" {{ Math.floor(Date.now()/1000) }}

parameters.text:
=Eres un experto en eficiencia energ√©tica de edificios universitarios.
Se detect√≥ una anomal√≠a de consumo el√©ctrico:
- √Årea: {{ $('Switch Severidad').item.json.area }}
- Consumo Actual: {{ $('Switch Severidad').item.json.kwh }} kWh
- Consumo Esperado (EMA): {{ $('Switch Severidad').item.json.ema }} kWh
- Desviaci√≥n: {{ $('Switch Severidad').item.json.desviacion }}%
- Severidad: {{ $('Switch Severidad').item.json.severidad }}

Responde √öNICAMENTE con un objeto JSON (sin markdown) con estas llaves:
{
  "causa": "explicaci√≥n breve de la causa",
  "accion": "acci√≥n inmediata para mantenimiento",
  "prioridad": "Alta|Media|Baja",
  "diagnostico_ext": "resumen de 1-2 l√≠neas"
}

parameters.query:
INSERT INTO anomalias (timestamp, area, dispositivo, severidad, valor_kwh, ema_kwh, desviacion, recomendacion)
VALUES (NOW(), $1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7);

] }}

parameters.query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as puede_alertar FROM anomalias WHERE area = '{{ $('Switch Severidad').item.json.area }}' AND timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '3 minutes';
